html: The Harlot Babylon’s “procurers,” “salesmen,” or “pimps” (soharaik)—everyone who profits from her business—meets the same fate she does. The archtyrant—Jehovah’s fire, hand, and flame—burns up those in her spiritual category, Jehovah’s unrepentant people and the nations alike (Isaiah 13:19; 37:18-19; 66:15-16). Those who reject the God of Israel, who “deviate” or “err” (ta‘u) from his covenant, can’t save the Harlot Babylon even as she can’t save them. De-created spiritually from what they once were, they are now reduced to “stubble” that feeds the fire (Isaiah 5:24; 9:18-19; 33:11-14).
